mantras.title: Rama Gayatri Mantra
mantras.sanskrit: ॐ दाशरथाय विद्महे सीता वल्लभाय धीमहि। तन्नो राम प्रचोदयात्॥
mantras.transliteration: Om Dasharathaya Vidmahe Sita Vallabhaya Dhimahi। Tanno Rama Prachodayat॥
mantras.translation: Let us meditate on Dasharatha's son, who is dear to Sita. May Rama enlighten us.

mantras.title: Rama Moola Mantra
mantras.translation: Om, I bow down to Rama.

mantras.title: Rama Dhun
mantras.sanskrit: श्री राम जय राम जय जय राम
mantras.transliteration: Shri Ram Jai Ram Jai Jai Ram
mantras.translation: Chanting the victory of Lord Rama.

mantras.title: Rama Raksha Stotram
mantras.translation: A protective hymn for invoking the blessings and protection of Lord Rama.
